page.title: 18Football near Culcheth
page.content:
We like going to watch football matches because we enjoy watching our favourite team play. Our favourite is Manchester United F.C. They won the F.A.Cup this season (1984-85). They were fourth in the First Division but were knocked out of the Milk Cup. It's better than watching it on T.V. because you really get the atmosphere. Also you can support them better if you are there. Philip has been to one match and I have been to two, and we both enjoyed all of the matches. The only thing I dislike about going to matches is that you have to travel so far. Also you have to get there very early to get a decent seat.
{Richard Steventon & Philip Berry
